ExampleDesign.Name: cpm_pcie_qdma
ExampleDesign.DisplayName: Versal ACAP CPM Gen4x8 QDMA EP Design
ExampleDesign.Description: This is Versal ACAP CPM Gen4x8 QDMA Endpoint Design with both Memory Map and Streaming options enabled. It allows generating CPM4 and CPM5 versions for VCK190 and VPK120 respectively based on the board selected. The associated drivers can be downloaded from: https://github.com/Xilinx/dma_ip_drivers
